item.title: Hack Your Data Beautiful
item.description: The PsyTeachR postgrads are putting on a workshop sponsored by the Scottish Graduate School of Social Science on April 15-16, 2019. Schedule and materials Abstract Coding is a skill that can be picked up by people from all backgrounds, for any kind of data. Everyone can be a data scientist! Coding skills provide tools to enhance communicating your data and ideas to a wide range of audiences and disciplines. If youâ€™ve ever wanted to learn how to make your own website or to visualise your data in a way that is engaging and rigorous, coding is for you.
